sentences.en: A strain of mutant mice groom compulsively till they seriously injure themselves.
sentences.cn: 有一类基因变异的老鼠会强迫性地给自己梳毛,直到严重受伤为止.

sentences.en: He cleaned his shoes compulsively after every walk.
sentences.cn: 每次步行之后他都会禁不住擦干净自己的鞋子.

sentences.en: He shows himself to be confident, addicted ( almost compulsively ) to hardship, somewhat contemptuous of the Indians.
sentences.cn: 他显示他自己是个充满自信 、 不怕吃苦 ( 几乎是自讨苦吃 ) 的人, 有一点瞧不起印第安人.

sentences.en: They were fed compulsively in petticoats and took the hormone.
